channel.title: Trouble logging in
channel.description:
Hello, I have had some trouble lately. After clicking log in, this message would appear in the message box (the black one below the game screen):
Server:ClientHandler: Accepted from owner-b553dba5a.home:2457
I'm not sure what this means, but my character was unable to move and a "connection lost" message appeared shortly after login. In addition, when I tried to log in again, the box said that I was already logged in. What is this?
Thanks, Mod Soren

item.title: Trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Did the client come with the source you are using? If not then your probably getting glitched.

Read full topic
